mapper.insert: insert into booking (customerid, roomid, checkindate, checkoutdate) values (#{customerid}, #{roomid}, #{checkindate}, #{checkoutdate})
mapper.select: select bookingid, checkindate, checkoutdate, bookingdate, customer.name as name, phone, typename, companyname, companyid, photo, (DATEDIFF(checkoutdate, checkindate) + 1) * price AS price from booking left join customer on booking.customerid = customer.customerid left join room on booking.roomid = room.roomid left join roomtype on room.typeid = roomtype.typeid left join company on room.userid = company.userid where bookingid = #{bookingid}

select bookingid, booking.customerid, booking.checkindate, booking.checkoutdate, booking.bookingdate, customer.name as name, phone, typename, photo, area, companyname, companyid, facilities, room.name as roomName, (DATEDIFF(checkoutdate, checkindate) + 1) * price AS price from booking left join customer on booking.customerid = customer.customerid left join room on booking.roomid = room.roomid left join roomtype on room.typeid = roomtype.typeid left join company on room.userid = company.userid where booking.customerid = #{customerid}

and customer.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and typename like concat('%',#{typename},'%') and booking.customerid=#{customerid} and booking.roomid=#{roomid} and companyname=#{companyname}
